document_data.mainbody:
essafon was a yuan-ti abomination that led a cell of yuan-ti rebels near the High Road of Cormyr during the late 15 century DR.
The yuan-ti and their followers were active around the Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar and the Shadovar pursuit of Oriphaun Huntsilvers Nether Scroll. They had set up their camp in caverns below the surface, and had a small teleporter of sorts to pass above and below.
